name: Pumpkin Invasion
description:
Pumpkin Invasion..

This game is  a top down 3D shooter game, your objective is kill as many pumpkin heads as possible and surviving the waves by collecting meds to heal, cash to buy new weapons and upgrades (some of them are not implemented yet), and candies that are dropped from the pumpkin's bodies, collect all the treat you can so you can escape and survive the pumpkins invasion. Good luck

Instructions:

  • Move around using W A S D, or the arrows.
  • Shoot using left mouse click.
  • Press "i" to show the shop menu and escape to hide it.
